name: Mystic Ark: Maboroshi Gekijo
description:
Mystic Ark: Maboroshi Gekijo is an Adventure game, developed by Produce and published by Enix Corporation, which was released in Japan in 1999.
"Entry of the scarecrow head; past the painted paybox, and bid me join the show. Night witch brigade turn the mirror, and reel of dream unrolled."
